topics.body:
So in actually important news the NSA might shut down.


Essentially congress has until 8pm eastern time *SUNDAY* in the usa to extent the patriot act, but at this point congress is squabbling so hard about it that it might not be extended.  The reason to keep a eye on it is because there's a very real possibility the nsa might be kill.  To use an analogy imagine congress has a revolver with 3 out of the 6 slots with bullets pointing it at the nsa; legitimately *nobody* knows if the nsa will close down or stay open.  This is legitimately closer than the any recent presidential election and more important than any recent one cause it effects not only the usa but everyone.

"Will congress extend the patriot act?"
I don't know, nobody knows.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

"@Kaz":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/556921f4636872238a3e1c00#post_556921f4636872238a3e1c00
Fuck!  I meant 8pm EST Sunday May 31st.

People on both sides of the argument are sweating cause nobody knows if the nsa will be killed off or not.  Someone saying that they know is like someone saying that they can judge how fast the cylinder of a revolver is moving and thus can determine if a chamber has a bullet in a game of russian roulette.

topics.body:
"@Kaz":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/556922436368723ac1070200#post_556922436368723ac1070200
To use a metaphor for why everyone is sweating right now is that it's like that point while playing jenga where there's only one piece left you can move and everyone's getting nervous and just silent waiting and seeing if the person can manage to pull it off or not.

If the patriot act fails to be extended it will be far harder to repass it.

"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5569236a6368721a7fbc4600#post_5569236a6368721a7fbc4600
[bq="SeraphimDawn"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55692192636872079f0f1000#post_55692192636872079f0f1000
Even if NSA does close down. They will try to spy on citizens one way or another. What's stopping them from essentially resurrecting the organization under a different name?[/bq]
Cause if they do they will legitimately go to prison; if they do then the president and a sizeable chunk of congress will go to prison.  They *HAVE* to extend the act cause if they don't and they continue the program they will go to jail.
